author: veithen
msg: Simplified the builder code. The builder doesn't need to keep track of the last node created, but only of the container (document or element) that is being built. Using the latter approach has several advantages:
* It greatly simplifies the builder code.
* The builder can handle documents and elements in a uniform way.
* A node can be safely detached without the next sibling being created.
